sourcesContent:
<template>
    <button @click="onClick()" :style="{background:color}" class="btn" >{{text}}</button>
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        name: 'button',
        props: {
            text: String,
            color: String,
        },
        methods: {
            onClick(){
                this.$emit('btn-click');
            }
        }
    }
</script>

<style>
</style>
